title: Transformer Inertial Poser: Attention-based Real-time Human Motion Reconstruction from Sparse IMUs
abstract: smaller in size. We evaluate our method extensively on synthesized and real IMU data, and with real-time live demos.

tldr.text: This work evaluates its method extensively on synthesized and real IMU data, and with real-time live demos, to show that it can be used to solve the challenge of integrating 3D image recognition into the instruction set.
